title: Mirion Acquires Certrec, a Leader in Regulatory Compliance and Advanced Digital Applications for the Nuclear Industry
summary: ATLANTA--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Mirion (NYSE: MIR), a global provider of radiation detection, measurement, analysis, and monitoring solutions to the nuclear, medical, defense, and research end markets, today announced the acquisition of Certrec, a leading supplier of regulatory compliance and digital integration solutions for the energy industry. title: EOTECH Acquires VK Integrated Systems, Expands into Tactical Networking and Battlefield Sensor Integration
summary: In a strategic move to expand its role in the defense technology ecosystem, EOTECH announced today the acquisition of VK Integrated Systems (VKIS).
